item.title: The Island Lodge Research
item.description: Research Methods Research methods include: competitive analysis online survey usability tests interviews Findings were synthesised through affinity diagramming and presented in a customer journey map. For the design outcome, please refer to The Island Lodge Hotel Booking case study. Online Survey To understand users’ goals, behaviours, and pain points regarding the online hotel booking process, I conducted an online survey with family and friends. This was a valuable source of insights.
